com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl

Class RestfulJsonClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.RestfulClient
      • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl.RestfulJsonClient

  • public class RestfulJsonClient
extends RestfulClient

    A basic implementation of RestfulClient for standard CRUD operations. This implementation is used for web services which send responses back as JSON.

    Version:
    1.0 03/21/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat
